12 //====================================================================================================
13 
14 //general template
15 template <class F>
16 struct Closure;
17 
18 //forward declaration of specialization
19 template <TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
20 struct Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>;
21 
22 //====================================================================================================
23 namespace detail
24 {
25 
26 //this template generate function, which call "pmem" member function
27 template <class T, TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST, R (T::*pmem)(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>
28  R ProxyFunc(void *p_this PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST_COMMA)
29 {
30  return (static_cast<T *>(p_this) ->* pmem)( PARAM_ARG_LIST);
31 }
32 
33 //this template generate function, which call "pmem" const member function
34 template <class T, TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST, R (T::*pmem)(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)const>
35  R ProxyFuncConst(void *p_this PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST_COMMA)
36 {
37  return (static_cast<T *>(p_this) ->* pmem)(PARAM_ARG_LIST);
38 }
39 
40 namespace CLOSURE_NUM
41 {
42 
43 //base for Closure
44 //for example, if CLOSURE_NUM is Closure2, then
45 //Closure2::ClosureBase is superclass for Closure<int(long, long)>
46 
47 template <TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
48 struct ClosureBase
49 {
50  typedef R (*p_proxy_type)(void * PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST_COMMA);
51  void *p_this;
52  p_proxy_type p_proxy;
53 
54 #if CLOSURE_FUNCTION
55  std::shared_ptr< std::function< R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> > p_function;
56 #endif
57 
58  R operator()(PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST)
59  {
60  return p_proxy(p_this PARAM_ARG_LIST_COMMA);
61  }
62 
63 };
64 
65 } //namespace CLOSURE_NUM
66 
67 } //namespace detail
68 
69 //====================================================================================================
70 template <TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
71 struct Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>: public detail::CLOSURE_NUM::ClosureBase<R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA>
72 {
73  //default initialization
74  Closure()
75  {
76  this->p_this= 0;
77  this->p_proxy= 0;
78  }
79 
80 
81  //initialization with proxy function "p_proxy_function" and context "p_this".
82  //signature of p_proxy_function should match template parameters of Closure<...>
83  //and take additional parameter void *
84  Closure(
85  void *p_this,
86  typename detail::CLOSURE_NUM::ClosureBase<R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA>::p_proxy_type p_proxy_function)
87  {
88  this->p_this= p_this;
89  this->p_proxy= p_proxy_function;
90  }
91 
92  #if CLOSURE_FUNCTION
93  Closure( const std::function< R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>& f)
94  {
95  this->p_function = std::make_shared< std::function<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> >(f);
96  this->p_this = this->p_function.get();
97  this->p_proxy = callfunction;
98  }
99 
100  template<class T>
101  Closure(T f)//lambda support
102  {
103  this->p_function = std::make_shared< std::function<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> >(f);
104  this->p_this = this->p_function.get();
105  this->p_proxy = callfunction;
106  }
107 
108  static R callfunction(void* ptr PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST_COMMA)
109  {
110  std::function< R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST) > *f = (std::function< R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST) > *)ptr;
111  return (*f)(PARAM_ARG_LIST);
112  }
113 #endif
114 
115  private:
116  struct dummy { void nonnull() {} };
117  typedef void (dummy::*safe_bool)();
118 
119  public:
120  //return value which can be implicitly casted to bool.
121  //true, if object initialized with some non-NULL function
122  //false, otherwise
123  operator safe_bool() const
124  {
125  if(this->p_proxy)
126  return &dummy::nonnull;
127  else
128  return 0;
129  }
130 
131  bool operator!() const
132  {
133  return !safe_bool(*this);
134  }
135 
136  bool operator == (const Closure &c) const
137  {
138  return this->p_proxy == c.p_proxy && this->p_this == c.p_this
139 #if CLOSURE_FUNCTION
140  && this->p_function == c.p_function
141 #endif
142  ;
143  }
144 
145 };
146 
147 //====================================================================================================
148 namespace detail
149 {
150  namespace CLOSURE_NUM
151  {
152 
153  template <class T, TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
154  struct CreateClosureHelper
155  {
156  template <R (T::*p_mem)(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>
157  Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> Init(T *p_this)
158  {
159  Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> c(
160  p_this,
161  ProxyFunc<T, R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA , p_mem>);
162  return c;
163  }
164  };
165 
166  template <class T, TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
167  struct CreateClosureHelperConst
168  {
169  template <R (T::*p_mem)(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)const>
170  Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> Init(const T *p_this)
171  {
172  Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> c(
173  const_cast<void*>(static_cast<const void*>(p_this)),
174  ProxyFuncConst<T, R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA, p_mem>);
175  return c;
176  }
177  };
178  } //namespace CLOSURE_NUM
179 
180  //helper function, to deduce return and parameters types of given pointer to member function
181  template <class T, TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
182  CLOSURE_NUM::CreateClosureHelper<T, R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA> CreateClosure(R (T::*)(PARAM_TYPE_LIST))
183  {
184  return CLOSURE_NUM::CreateClosureHelper<T, R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA>();
185  }
186 
187 #if CLOSURE_FUNCTION
188  template <TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
189  Closure<R (PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> CreateClosureF(const std::function< R (PARAM_TYPE_LIST) > & f )
190  {
191  return Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>(f);
192  }
193 
194  /*
195 
196  template <TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
197  Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> CreateClosureF( R (*f) (PARAM_TYPE_LIST) )
198  {
199  std::function<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)> fn = f;
200  return Closure<R(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)>(fn);
201  }
202  */
203 #endif
204 
205 
206  //helper function, to deduce return and parameters types of given pointer to member const function
207  template <class T, TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST>
208  CLOSURE_NUM::CreateClosureHelperConst<T, R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA> CreateClosure(R (T::*)(PARAM_TYPE_LIST)const)
209  {
210  return CLOSURE_NUM::CreateClosureHelperConst<T, R PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA>();
211  }
212 } //namespace detail

217 #undef TEMPLATE_PARAM_LIST
218 #undef PARAM_TYPE_LIST
219 #undef PARAM_TYPE_LIST_COMMA
220 #undef PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST
221 #undef PARAM_FORM_ARG_LIST_COMMA
222 #undef PARAM_ARG_LIST
223 #undef PARAM_ARG_LIST_COMMA
224 #undef CLOSURE_NUM
